scripts.build:main: bun build src/main.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external electron && bun build src/preload.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --external electron --format cjs
scripts.dev:electron: bun run build:main && concurrently "bun run dev" "nodemon --watch src/main.ts --exec \"bun run build:main && bunx electron .\""
scripts.build:release: bun run build && bunx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --linux --x64
scripts.build:win: bun run build && bunx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win --x64
scripts.build:linux: bun run build && bunx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux --x64
